name: BSO
comment:
>>40004956
It's work, but it's a lot of fun. Because I've got a very detailed mental profile of him: someone who sort of goes with the flow, even when he doesn't really know what's going on, just to see how far he can get, and it turns out to work a lot better in a video game than it does in real life.

In other news, there's a pretty nasty storm sweeping through my area at the moment and I just lost a couple minutes of work to a power outage. I'd hate to cancel, but might have to pick up tomorrow if this trend continues. For now, let's see how things go...
